statements: SELECT * FROM telecardiology_data WHERE diagnosis = 'Hypertension';
SELECT patient_name, age FROM telecardiology_data WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM telecardiology_data ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT AVG(age) FROM telecardiology_data;
SELECT DISTINCT encryption_key FROM telecardiology_data;
SELECT * FROM telecardiology_data WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM telecardiology_data WHERE diagnosis LIKE 'Heart%' ORDER BY age;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM telecardiology_data WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT patient_name, age, encryption_key FROM telecardiology_data ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT * FROM telecardiology_data WHERE age >= 40 AND encryption_key IS NOT NULL ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob FROM patients ORDER BY patient_dob DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE record_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob FROM patients ORDER BY patient_dob DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT COUNT(*), patient_gender FROM patients GROUP BY patient_gender;
SELECT patients.patient_name, medical_records.record_date FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id ORDER BY record_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT * FROM cardiologists WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT consultation_id, patient_name, cardiologist_name, consultation_date FROM consultations;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE diagnosis IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM cardiologists WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology' ORDER BY cardiologist_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, consultation_date FROM patients JOIN consultations ON patients.patient_id = consultations.patient_id;
SELECT cardiologist_name, department FROM cardiologists JOIN consultations ON cardiologists.cardiologist_id = consultations.cardiologist_id WHERE consultation_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT name, dob, address FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis='COVID-19';
SELECT doctor_name, diagnosis, treatment_plan FROM medical_records WHERE doctor_name='Dr. Smith';
SELECT name, specialization, hospital FROM doctors;
SELECT name, dob, address FROM patients WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19' ORDER BY record_id DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, hospital FROM doctors WHERE doctor_id = 3;
SELECT name, dob, address FROM patients WHERE id IN (2, 4, 6) ORDER BY dob ASC;
SELECT name, diagnosis, treatment_plan FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.id = medical_records.patient_id WHERE patients.id = 5;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM doctors WHERE hospital_name='ABC Hospital';
SELECT record_date, diagnosis FROM medical_records WHERE patient_id=101;
SELECT * FROM prescriptions WHERE frequency='daily' ORDER BY prescription_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT doctor_name, hospital_name, specialization FROM doctors ORDER BY doctor_name ASC;
SELECT prescription_id, drug_name, dosage, frequency FROM prescriptions WHERE drug_name LIKE '%aspirin%' AND dosage = '100mg';
SELECT medical_records.record_id, patients.patient_name, medical_records.diagnosis FROM medical_records INNER JOIN patients ON medical_records.patient_id = patients.patient_id;
